abstract: The Taxi and Limousine Commission says it will consider a plan to do away with the smaller "off-duty" lights in favor of a single, central beacon, but City Room wonders: Don't you have a better idea?
snippet: The Taxi and Limousine Commission says it will consider a plan to do away with the smaller "off-duty" lights in favor of a single, central beacon, but City Room wonders: Don't you have a better idea?
lead_paragraph: The humble, occasionally head-scratching taxicab roof light is coming in for a makeover. New Yorkers, what would you like to see sitting atop your cab?

headline.main: Vacant Taxi or Occupied? That Is the Question
